entry.title: Introduction
entry.content: A determined romantic, an optimistic salty fish, and an undefined soul free agent. Not a muggle. I am curious about many things and have a big imagination. In my spare time, I like to take aimless walks, hang out with friends, go to new cities to taste food and experience different cultures.

entry.title: Hello Everyone~
entry.content:
Welcome ~ I use this blog to record some interesting things as well as my personal introduction. My publications and paper links are placed in the Research block. My resume is placed in Education block. Please refer to the navigation bar.

Btw, my idol is Steph Curry of the Warriors. If you are fan of Steph, then we are friends.
